title: Mac Disconnection After Finishing A Gamw
body:
Hey sorry new to forums,

Recently after every game of league (I'm on mac OSX El Capitan) i get a "failed to connect to chat" "Server request timed out" and then it closes the application? anyone else get this or does my mac just hate me ? sorry if this isnt the place to post this idk what I'm doing xD

Nothing bad happens and it dosent hinder my gaming, just inconvenient having to relog after every game

replies.body: If noone here can help you out try submitting a ticket [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) the player support team can likely help you.
